mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager (office_id, name, passwd, rule) VALUES (#{officeId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{rule,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler})
mapper.update:
UPDATE manager
passwd=#{password},
nickname=#{nickname},
rule=#{rule,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler},
where member_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.manager_id AS id, m.office_id AS officeId, m.name AS name, m.rule AS rule FROM manager m WHERE m.name = #{name} AND m.passwd = #{password}
